Message.Title: upgrade after they loaded up on cheap shares!
Message.Msg: As previously reported, Evercore upgraded eBay (EBAY) to Overweight from Equal Weight. The firm believes the impact from MasterCard's (MA) fee increase will be less than 50bps of Paypal's margin and that the pullback has created a buying opportunity in eBay shares. Price target is $64.

Topic.Title: A warn & fuzzy feeling just for

Message.Msg: File your tax return. You should be able to get back some or all of what was withheld in that day job you had. When the state of CA seizes, they ignore withholding. You have to file a return to claim it.... And it is possible to be broke and owe taxes; it happens often. Take control, bro.
